thread.title: BRIEF-Zions Bancorp Q1 Earnings Per Share $1.09

title: BRIEF-Zions Bancorp Q1 Earnings Per Share $1.09
text: April 23, 2018 / 8:32 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Zions Bancorp Q1 Earnings Per Share $1.09 Reuters Staff   Zions Bancorporation: * REPORTS FIRST QUARTER FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.09 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.82 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * QTRLY NET INTEREST INCOME WAS $542 MILLION, UP 11 PERCENT * QTRLY NIM WAS 3.56% COMPARED WITH 3.38% * BASEL III COMMON EQUITY TIER 1 (“CET1”) CAPITAL WAS $6.3 BILLION AT MARCH 31, 2018 * TANGIBLE BOOK VALUE PER COMMON SHARE INCREASED TO $30.76 AT MARCH 31, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
